# Svirfneblin Spells
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Svirfneblin|svirfneblin]] spells introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Gem Sanctuary]]
- [[Imbue Faculty]]
- [[Refracted Gaze]]
